company_name.value: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited

product_uin.description: Unique Identification Number of the product

product_type.description: Type of the insurance product (e.g., Term, ULIP, Endowment)

distribution_channel.description: Distribution channel for the product (e.g., Online, Offline, Online and Offline, Agent)

plan_description.value:
1. **Income Options**: Provides income for 10, 20, or 30 years or a combination of both.
2. **Premium Payment Flexibility**: Flexibility to pay premiums once, for a limited period, or throughout the policy term.
3. **Tax Benefits**: Tax benefits may be applicable on premiums paid and benefits received as per prevailing tax laws.
4. **Policy Features**: Benefits and interests under this policy will stand extinguished if certain conditions are met.
5. **Claim Conditions**: The policy must be in force at the time of availing features, and the feature must be exercised within 6 months from the event, provided no claim has been admitted.
6. **Eligibility for Features**: Available to the Life Assured underwritten as a standard life at inception, and the insured must be less than 50 years of age at the time of opting for this feature.
7. **Regular Pay Policies**: This feature is available for Regular Pay policies only.
8. **Increase in Sum Assured**: Such increase in sum assured is only applicable to the base death benefit.

plan_options.value:
1. **Life**: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability  
2. **Life Plus**: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability + Accidental Death Benefit  
3. **Life & Health**: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability + Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit  
4. **All in One**: Death Benefit + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability + Accidental Death Benefit + Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit
plan_options.description: Available plan options for the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy
chunks:
How does this plan protect you
You can choose your level of protection by selecting one of the below beneﬁt options:
Beneﬁt Option     Beneﬁts
Life Death Beneﬁt + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability 
Life Plus  Death Beneﬁt + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability 
 + Accidental Death Beneﬁt
Life & Health Death Beneﬁt + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability 
 + Accelerated Critical Illness Beneﬁt
All in One Death Beneﬁt + Terminal Illness + Waiver of Premium on permanent disability
 + Accidental Death Beneﬁt + Accelerated Critical Illness Beneﬁt
Your premium will vary depending on the beneﬁt option chosen.

terminal_illness_benefits.value:
The **terminal illness** benefits under the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy are as follows:
1. The **Death Benefit (DB)** will be paid to your nominee/legal heir upon the **diagnosis of terminal illness**.
2. The policy will terminate upon the payment of this benefit.
3. The **Death Benefit** is payable as:
   - For **Single Pay**: The higher of:
     - 125% of the **Single Premium** or 
     - **Sum Assured** chosen by you.
   - For **Regular Pay and Limited Pay**: The higher of:
     - 7 times the **annualized premium** or 
     - 105% of the total premiums received up to the date of death or diagnosis of terminal illness or 
     - **Sum Assured** chosen by you.

death_benefit_payment_option.value:
1. **Death Benefit** will be paid to the nominee/legal heir on the first occurrence of either:
   - **Death of the Life Assured**, or
   - **Diagnosis of Terminal Illness**.

2. The policy will terminate upon payment of the **Death Benefit**.

3. **Death Benefit Payout Options**:
   - **Life Option**:
     - **Single Pay**: Higher of:
       - 125% of the Single Premium, or 
       - Sum Assured chosen by you.
   - **Regular Pay and Limited Pay**: Higher of:
       - 7 times the annualized premium, or 
       - 105% of the total premiums received up to the date of death or diagnosis of terminal illness, or 
       - Sum Assured chosen by you.

4. **Lump Sum and Income**: The total amount payable on death or terminal illness will be equal to the **Death Benefit** reduced by any **ACI benefit** paid, if applicable. The **Death Benefit** will be paid as a combination of income and lump sum payout options:
   - The percentage of the **Death Benefit** to be paid out as lump sum is chosen at inception.
   - The balance **Death Benefit** will be paid out in equal monthly installments in advance for the chosen **Income Term** at a defined rate of **Death Benefit** as given in the **Income payout option**.

5. **Increasing Income**: The benefit amount is payable in monthly installments for 10 years starting with 10% of the **Death Benefit**.

premium_paying_term.value:
1. **Single Pay**: Premium payment is made as a one-time payment.
2. **Regular Pay**: Premium payment is made regularly throughout the policy term.
3. **Limited Pay**: Premium payment is made for a limited number of years, after which the policy is fully paid up.

instant_cash_benefit.value: The **Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit (ACI Benefit)** offers coverage against **34 critical illnesses**. In the event of a major illness, a lump sum payment is made to meet financial needs, payable on the first occurrence of any of the covered illnesses. This benefit is payable irrespective of the actual expenses incurred by the policyholder.
instant_cash_benefit.description: Instant cash benefit available under the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy for critical illnesses.
chunks:
In this option, along with the beneﬁts under the Life Option, you are also covered for the Accelerated Critical Illness 
Beneﬁt (ACI Beneﬁt). The ACI Beneﬁt offers you coverage against 34 critical illnesses. When a major illness strikes, it 
can place a huge burden on your family, not only because of the cost of medical care but also because you may not be 
able to work. To protect you against this, we will pay you the ACI Beneﬁt, as a lump sum to meet your ﬁnancial needs. 
The beneﬁt is payable irrespective of the actual expenses incurred by the policyholder.
This beneﬁt is payable, on ﬁrst occurrence of any of the covered 34 illnesses. The ACI Beneﬁt, is accelerated and not an

surrender_benefits.value:
1. **Surrender Value** for Single Pay policies is equal to **Unexpired Risk Premium Value** if the policyholder voluntarily surrenders the policy during the policy term.

2. **Unexpired Risk Premium Value** for Single Pay policies is calculated as:
   - 25% X [1 – (Policy Month of surrender – 1)/ (Policy Term X 12)] X **Total Premiums Paid**.

3. For **Limited Pay policies**:
   - If one full year’s premium is not paid, **Unexpired Risk Premium Value** = 0.
   - If one full year’s premium has been paid, then **Unexpired Risk Premium Value** = 25% X [Number of months for which premiums are paid / (Premium Payment Term X 12)] X [1 – (Policy Month of surrender – 1)/ (Policy Term X 12)] X **Total Premiums Paid**.

4. For **Regular Pay policies**:
   - **Unexpired Risk Premium Value** = 0 if any premium instalment is not paid within the grace period, leading to policy lapse and cessation of cover.

5. Once the surrender feature is exercised and the benefit is paid, the policy will terminate, and all benefits and interests under this policy will stand extinguished.

exit_options.value:
1. **Smart Exit Benefit**: The policyholder has the option to cancel the policy and receive a Smart Exit Benefit, which is equal to **Total Premiums Paid** under the policy. 
2. **Eligibility for Smart Exit Benefit**: This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25 but not during the last 5 policy years, provided the age of the life assured is **60 years or more** at the time of exercise. 
3. **Conditions for Exercising Smart Exit Benefit**: The policy must be in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option, and no claim for any of the underlying benefits should have been registered, evaluated, accepted, or paid on the policy. 
4. **Termination of Policy**: Once the Smart Exit Benefit is exercised and the benefit is paid, the policy shall terminate, and all benefits and interests under this policy will stand extinguished.
exit_options.description: Exit values/options/benefits available for the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy excluding surrender benefits and paid-up value.
chunks:
You have an option to cancel the policy and receive Smart Exit Beneﬁt, equal to Total Premiums Paid** under the policy. No 
additional premium is payable to avail this option. 
The following terms and conditions shall apply:
•  This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25 but not during the last 5 policy years, provided the age of  
 the life assured is 60 years or more at the time of exercise.
•  The policy is in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option.
•  No claim for any of the underlying beneﬁts has been registered and is under evaluation/ or accepted/ or paid/ being paid 
 on the policy.

Surrender
For Single Pay policies, Surrender value equal to unexpired risk premium value will be payable if the policy holder voluntarily 
surrenders the policy during the policy term.
Unexpired risk premium value = 25% X [1 – (Policy Month of surrender – 1)/ (Policy Term X 12)] X Total Premiums Paid.
For unexpired risk premium value for Limited Pay policies & Regular policies, please refer T&C 13.
Once this feature is exercised and the beneﬁt is paid, the policy shall terminate and all beneﬁts and interests under this policy 
will stand extinguished. The policyholder can either opt for Smart Exit Beneﬁt or Unexpired Risk Premium Value as per S. No.

exit_option_conditions.value:
1. **Exit Value/Options**: The policy offers a **Smart Exit Benefit**, which is equal to the **Total Premiums Paid** under the policy. 
2. **Conditions for Exercising Smart Exit Benefit**: 
   - This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than **25** but not during the last **5** policy years. 
   - The age of the life assured must be **60 years or more** at the time of exercising this option. 
   - The policy must be in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option. 
   - No claim for any of the underlying benefits has been registered, is under evaluation, accepted, or paid on the policy. 
   - The policyholder cannot avail both the Smart Exit Benefit and any other benefits simultaneously. 
3. **Definition of Total Premiums Paid**: It includes the total of all premiums paid under the base product, excluding any extra premium and taxes, if collected explicitly. If the **Life Stage Protection** options have been exercised, it includes premiums paid for each tranche of additional sum assured purchased. If the benefit term for additional benefits has expired at the time of exercise, the premiums paid towards such additional benefits will be excluded from the Total Premiums Paid.
exit_option_conditions.description: Details regarding the Exit value/options/benefits terms/conditions for the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy.
chunks:
You have an option to cancel the policy and receive Smart Exit Beneﬁt, equal to Total Premiums Paid** under the policy. No 
additional premium is payable to avail this option. 
The following terms and conditions shall apply:
•  This option can be exercised in any policy year greater than 25 but not during the last 5 policy years, provided the age of  
 the life assured is 60 years or more at the time of exercise.
•  The policy is in-force with all due premiums paid at the time of exercising this option.
•  No claim for any of the underlying beneﬁts has been registered and is under evaluation/ or accepted/ or paid/ being paid 
 on the policy.

13 of Terms & Conditions below i.e. he cannot avail both the beneﬁts simultaneously.
**Total Premiums Paid means the total of all premiums paid under the base product, excluding any extra premium, and taxes, if collected 
explicitly. Where Life Stage Protection options has been exercised, Total Premiums Paid includes Premium paid for each tranche of additional 
sum assured purchased. In case the beneﬁt term for additional beneﬁt(s), for which additional premium has been paid, has expired at the time 
of exercise of Smart Exit Beneﬁt, then Total Premiums Paid shall exclude the premium paid towards such additional beneﬁt(s).

discount_female.value:
1. **15% discount** on premium rates for life cover (Death Benefit) as compared to male lives.
2. **Enhanced protection**: Coverage against death, terminal illness, and disability specifically designed for women.
3. **Comprehensive additional benefits**: Option to choose Accidental Death Benefit and Accelerated Critical Illness Benefit, which includes coverage for female organ cancers such as breast cancer and cervical cancer.
discount_female.description: Details of discounts and benefits specifically for women under the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy.
chunks:
Covers female organ cancers such as breast cancer and cervical cancer under Accelerated Critical Illness Beneﬁt
Special premium rates for Accelerated Critical Illness Beneﬁt 
15% discount on premium rates for life cover (Death Beneﬁt) as compared to male lives
Key beneﬁts for women
Enhanced protection: Coverage against death, terminal illness and disability
Comprehensive additional beneﬁts: Option to choose Accidental Death Beneﬁt and Accelerated 
Critical Illness Beneﬁt
Special premium rates for non-tobacco users
Special discount on ﬁrst year’s premium for salaried customers
Need based beneﬁt payout: Choose to receive the beneﬁt amount as a lump sum or as monthly

discount_salaried.value: A discount as mentioned below will be offered on the first year’s premium of **Death Benefit**, **Terminal Illness**, and **Waiver of Premium on permanent disability** (excluding rider premiums, underwriting extra premiums, and taxes) to **salaried customers** opting for sum assured greater than or equal to ₹10,000,000.
discount_salaried.description: Details regarding the discount available for salaried customers under the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy.

Salaried customer discount
 Tax beneﬁts may be available as per prevailing tax laws. Tax 
beneﬁts under the policy are subject to prevailing conditions and 
provisions of the Income Tax Act, 1961. Goods and Services Tax 
and Cesses, if any, will be charged extra as per applicable rates. 
The tax laws are subject to amendments made thereto from time 
to time. Please consult your tax advisor for details, before acting 
on above.

discount_high_sum.value: A discount will be offered on the first year’s premium of Death Benefit, Terminal Illness, and Waiver of Premium on permanent disability for customers opting for a sum assured greater than or equal to ₹10,000,000. However, this discount is specifically for salaried customers, and no other high sum assured discounts are mentioned for non-salaried or existing customers.
discount_high_sum.description: High sum assured discount details for the ICICI Pru iProtect Smart policy.
